lines: Next morning a thin man takes Alissa in the house
-This is Alissa, - the man says her wife
She likes reading
They laugth
Suddenly a woman shouts at the Alissa
-You are not going to read here,- she shouts
-You are going to cook and to clean and to wash
Alissa works for fifth hours the day
The woman shouts at her every day
Alissa is very unhappy
She cries every day
One day, the thin man says to Alissa:
- pack your things. You must go.
You do not likes my wife
The thin man takes her to the clothes shop in the city
a shop owner is a big woman
She gives to the man some money
He goes
He does not say good bye to Alissa
Alissa works with five other girls
They works in a small, dark room
The girls work all day
They make a clothes
They work twenty hours a day
A at midday they eat lanch
After lunch they rest for ten minutes
At night they sleep on the floor
Every month the shop owner gives to girls a little money
Alissa buys a book with her money
She reads a book after dinner
the shop owner is surprised
The other girls can not read
-Can you write? Can you count? - the shop owner asks
-Yes, I can, - Alissa says
-Come, - the shop owner says
You are going to work in the shop
